mapper.insert: insert into t_book_all (book_id, book_name, book_author, book_publication_date, book_press, book_introduce, book_price, book_ISBN, book_type, book_status) values (#{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPublicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bookPress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bookIsbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_book_all set book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_author = #{bookAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_publication_date = #{bookPublicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, book_press = #{bookPress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_introduce = #{bookIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_price = #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, book_ISBN = #{bookIsbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_type = #{bookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_status = #{bookStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select book_id, book_name, book_author, book_publication_date, book_press, book_introduce, book_price, book_ISBN, book_type, book_status from t_book_all where book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select book_id, book_name, book_author, book_publication_date, book_press, book_introduce, book_price, book_ISBN, book_type, book_status from t_book_all
